participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, always looking for inspiration in food and life.
participant_1.background: Hey, my name is Larry and I'm a chef. If I am not cooking in the kitchen then I am definitely on the water. I also love comic books. Spiderman is my favorite.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Resilient and dedicated, balancing work as a recording engineer with being a father.
participant_2.background: What's up? I'm a 46-year-old single dad. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio.

content.text:
Оксана:
I am a accountant at a charity.
i do not have any hobbies , i am a accountant .
i do not have a job , i am a accountant .
i do not have a job , i work at a charity market .
